title: grass_cutting_completed_single_zone
summary: Completion of grass cutting in a specific farm zone within a defined time period.
description: This record documents the completion of grass cutting work in a designated zone of MaMeeFarm. The activity was completed in a single session lasting 18 minutes, demonstrating time-bounded manual farm maintenance under real operational conditions.
